sentences.english: And I will shew wonders in the heavens and in the earth, blood, and fire, and pillars of smoke.
sentences.chinese: 在天上地下，我要顯出奇事，有血有火，有煙柱。

sentences.english: Renew thy signs, and work new miracles.
sentences.chinese: 求你重顯神蹟，重行奇事。

sentences.english: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
sentences.chinese: 在敵人中間顯他的神蹟，在含地顯他的奇事。

sentences.english: These see the works of the LORD, and his wonders in the deep.
sentences.chinese: 他們看見耶和華的作爲，並他在深水中的奇事。

sentences.english: MARVEL】Space travel is one of the marvels of our time.
sentences.chinese: 太空旅行是我們這時代的奇事之一。

sentences.english: Who is like you-majestic in holiness, awesome in glory, working wonders?
sentences.chinese: 誰能象你至聖至榮，可頌可畏，施行奇事？

sentences.english: 8Now Stephen, a man full of God's grace and power, did great wonders and miraculous signs among the people.
sentences.chinese: 司提反滿得恩惠能力，在民間行了大奇事和神蹟。

sentences.english: Do you show your wonders to the dead?
sentences.chinese: 你豈要行奇事給死人看嗎？

sentences.english: It pleases me to make known to you the signs and wonders the Most High God has done in me.
sentences.chinese: 至高上主對我所行的神蹟奇事，我以爲最好宣佈出來。

sentences.english: 43 the day he displayed his miraculous signs in Egypt, his wonders in the region of Zoan.
sentences.chinese: 他怎樣在埃及地顯神蹟，在瑣安田顯奇事。

sentences.english: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead?
sentences.chinese: 你豈要行奇事給死人看嗎。

sentences.english: How he had wrought his signs in Egypt, and his wonders in the field of Zoan
sentences.chinese: 他怎樣在埃及地顯神蹟，在瑣安田顯奇事。

sentences.english: Now Stephen, a man full of God's grace and power, did great wonders and miraculous signs among the people.
sentences.chinese: 司提反滿得恩惠能力，在民間行了大奇事和神蹟。

sentences.english: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.
sentences.chinese: 求你使我明白你的訓詞，我就思想你的奇事。

sentences.english: Two men sitting under a tree, wandering thoughts about their own home.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人坐在一棵大樹下，說起自己家鄉的稀奇事。

sentences.english: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌就對他說，若不看見神蹟奇事，你們總是不信。

definition: sth else/a separate matter/not the same thing/with different jobs (not colleagues)/a remarkable thing/sth special/an odd thing/sth strange or incomprehensible
an eccentric/odd person/person of extraordinary talent
anecdote/lost or apocryphal story about famous person
nothing is too bizarre/full of extraordinary things
a matter for regret/sth that is a (great) pity
behind-the-scenes story/details known only to insiders
